short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage your prompts and inject them into ChatGPT textbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to manage your ChatGPT prompts. The current version includes the following features:

- Create/modify/delete prompts, 
- Create/modify/delete foders, 
- Organize your prompts with folders and tags
- Search through your prompts and folders
- Add any prompt to your current ChatGPT conversation with a single click.
- Share your prompt library through a simple CSV import/export

Still in development.
